title: Jos√© Antonio Kast - Wikipedia
snippet: Jos√© Antonio Kast Rist (born 18 January 1966) is a Chilean politician, lawyer, and the president-elect of Chile after winning the 2025 presidential election. He served in the Chamber of Deputies from 2002 to 2018, representing districts in the capital, Santiago.

snippet: Jos√© Antonio Kast, a far-right politician, who has praised Chile's dictatorship, has won the presidency, signaling a sharp rightward shift fueled by fears over crime, migration, and the economy.

title: Chile elects Kast as president in sharp rightward shift | Reuters
snippet: SANTIAGO, Dec 14 (Reuters) - Jose Antonio Kast won Chile's presidential election on Sunday, leveraging voter fears over rising crime and migration to steer the country in its sharpest rightward shift since the end of the military dictatorship ...
